subject: College Athletics
Football
Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Those who know Luke Fickell, who took over the Ohio State football team after Jim Tressel’s departure, say he will approach this season the only way he knows — straight on, without blinking.
snippet: Those who know Luke Fickell, who took over the Ohio State football team after Jim Tressel’s departure, say he will approach this season the only way he knows — straight on, without blinking.
